definitions.definition: A device used to produce music.
definitions.example: The violinist was a master of her instrument.

definitions.definition: A means or agency for achieving an effect.

definitions.example: The instrument detected an increase in radioactivity.

definitions.definition: A tool, implement used for manipulation or measurement.
definitions.example: The dentist set down his tray of instruments.

definitions.definition: A legal document, such as a contract, deed, trust, mortgage, power, indenture, or will.
definitions.example: A bond indenture is the instrument that gives a bond its value.

definitions.definition: A person used as a mere tool for achieving a goal.
To devise, conceive, cook up, plan.
To perform upon an instrument; to prepare for an instrument.
